overview: Asedillo, the modern day Robin Hood has been the icon of the poor. Needless to say, he had a lot of followers who wanted to do the same.. take the excess of the rich and give it to the less fortunate members of the society.  But eventually, the group starts to fall apart, when everybody start to think of their own interests. And only those with honest intentions will prevail.
title: Ang Anino Ni Asedillo
